name: U.S.N. Insurmountable Odds
description:
Your job is to steal a ship. You are a two man team. If you don't clear your implant terminal it will bug out. It's not a "bug" it's a "feature"!
(There is a bug "feature"that causes the music to double play on restart, refreshing the page fixes it.)
All assets and art and music made by Refundable

Like all my games there's probably typos because MSPaint doesn't have spell check and i'm illiterate. 

Made for

Random Theme Generator Jam

Hosted by

Rabid Colonialist

Source for GameMakerStudio 1.4 included, feel free to use anything for whatever. Drop me a comment if something was helpful.
